name: node.pgh
description:
Welcome to the Pittsburgh Node.js community Meetup!

This is a meetup to discuss Node.js, popular npm modules, general web development and JavaScript running on the server. If you're interested in Node personally or professionally, we'd love to hear from you. Stop by to hear about something cool or, even better, stop by to tell others about something cool! This group is intended for beginners all the way up to veteran Node and JavaScript developers.

name: Lansing Web Meetup
description:
Come hang out with other local web developers and designers!

Lansing Web Meetups are agenda-free events where you can share your latest project, talk about tools you’re using, network, trade career advice, or just chat about the web.

We also host talks, so if there’s a topic you’d like to learn more about or give a talk on, please let us know!

name: MN Bot Makers
description:
First came the internet, then web applications, then apps, and now bots. Bots are software that automate a task. Chatbots automate a conversation, and they work inside the world’s most popular apps. That makes them (and the A.I. the drives them) the NEXT BIG THING. This group is for bot makers (whether you realize that’s you yet or not) and all are welcome. Sponsored by Twin Cities startup Raisable.co and their chatbot Max, who helps you fundraise fast like a pro with personalized video.

We have a Slack team! Click here to join: https://mn-botmakers.slack.com/shared_invite/MTIzMjYwMjc0NzIyLTE0ODM1NDMxMTYtOGQyM2ZmYjMwMA

organizer.name: Eli Krumholz
organizer.bio: I am a PhD Candidate at the University of Minnesota Plant Biology department. My research focuses on studying metabolism with a computational systems biology approach.

next_event.name: Bot Talk: Chatbots and Their Applications

name: Palm Beach JavaScript
description:
If you're interested in anything related to JavaScript, then this meetup is for you!

This group is for anyone interested in JavaScript, client side, server side, and everything in between. We'll share ideas, talk about projects, listen to speakers, have demonstrations, and anything else one can think of. All skill levels welcome!

organizer.name: Joseph Russo
organizer.bio: Executive Director, Palm Beach Technology Association

name: Denver Full Stack
description: This group is for senior and junior level developers interested in full stack development. We will have a multi-track schedule, one for experienced devs on advanced topics and one for more junior devs covering the basics of full-stack development. The event will include beer and food at the downtown location of CommercialTribe, 17th and Market. With quarterly hack-a-thons and code reviews, we want this to be THE place to come to expand your full stack capabilities whether you are an engineering Jedi or Padawan.

next_event.name: Code Review - bring in your work and get some feedback from our engineerins

name: Spokane Frontend Developers Meetup
description:
The Spokane Frontend Meetup connects front-end developers to learn and discuss topics related to frontend web development. We meet the 1st Tuesday of each month at Mckinstry Innovation Center.

Our discussions cover topics related to JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Frameworks, best practices, etc. 

If you'd like to share your event or product feel free to start a discussion or message the organizers.

name: Software Development Lifecycle Complete
description: Anyone who is in the field of Software Development and who are interested in contributing or learning new techniques to deliver better results through best Software Development practices would enjoy being in this Meetup

organizer.name: Kiran N Bhat
organizer.bio: A Techie moved into Sales/Marketing & BD ... and currently building communities to share knowledge while I exchange new thoughts & ideas

next_event.name: Feb Edition of QIS - Full Stack Development

name: DTC Web & Mobile Development Group (formerly just Ruby)
description:
DTC Web & Mobile Development group is a place to learn and share information about building web and native mobile applications. We were formerly just the ruby group so there will be lots of talk about Ruby, the Rails framework and related technologies. Really there is just so much cool stuff out there that we are expanding to anything related to web & native mobile development. 


Some of the reasons people join our group:

* You're a developer looking to network with other developers in the tech center.

* You're not yet a developer, but are learning.

* You're an entrepreneur who wants to learn how to code your ideas.

* You're a person who wants to lean more about computer programing in general.


We have two types of meetups.

Presentation night where we have a couple of presentations given by members of the group. One of the presentations is always beginner oriented and preferably given by a beginner. The best way to learn is to teach someone else.

Hack night is a casual get together where people bring their laptops and work on something or get hands on help from other members of the group.

organizer.name: Bob Firestone
organizer.bio:
I am on meetup to join interesting people and learn new things.

I am a Ruby on Rails developer and every 3 months or so I teach a beginning programming class with other members of the Las Vegas Ruby Group.

name: RefactorU Education & Technology
description:
Interested in learning about up-and-coming technology? Want to harness your technical knowledge to develop innovative apps? Looking to network with people across all technological platforms?
As a group of passionate people who love making things, solving problems, and spreading knowledge, we want to host and create events that will inspire the community to join us in our creative endeavors.

organizer.name: RefactorU
organizer.bio: RefactorU accelerates the learning and development of the world's aspiring creatives, makers, and technologists.

name: Improve Your JavaScript
description:
This is a group for people who study JavaScript. This was an AngularJS group, but the JavaScript world changes so rapidly, that it now includes all types of JavaScript: Vue, Elm, PureScript, Angular, React, Mithril, ClojureScript, Vanilla JavaScript, or whatever you're interested in. All levels of experience are welcome.

If you would like to present about JavaScript topics, please contact me through the link in the sidebar.

If you're interested in helping to organize events, or know of a good venue, send an email. Be sure to also join the Code Self Study group! Some of our meetups are open to all languages.

Looking for resources for beginners? Check out our JavaScript Study Guide.

organizer.name: Josh
organizer.bio: Interested in learning more JavaScript, Python, Lisp.

name: CorkJS
description: Monthly meet-up for Corkonians to hang out and discuss all things JavaScript. This is just a bit of an informal chat with no speaker/presentation format but if you're working on something cool then feel free show it off! JS on the backend, JS on the frontend, interested beginners, and long-time pros. All are welcome. Come, hang out, and lets talk JS.

name: Yomeva
description:
Ce groupe est hébergé par Yomeva, ouvert à tout développeur, chef de projet, UX/UI et à tous ceux qui font partie du monde merveilleux de l'IT en général :)

Discuter, échanger, apprendre grâce à des lights talks et des débats !

Une ESN fondée par une union de développeurs, Yomeva a pour objectif de remettre le développeur au cœur des décisions tout en accompagnant ses clients dans la réalisation de leurs projets informatique.

organizer.name: Kader Lagraa
organizer.bio: Partner chez Yomeva, Regroupement de passionnés d'IT

name: Fresno.js JavaScript User Group
description: Fresno.js is Fresno's premier JavaScript user group. Join us as we learn from some of the best in the community about the state of the art in web, mobile, database and server development . Every first Tuesday is our official meetup where we get together at Bitwise Industries for presentations on the hottest topics in JavaScript.

next_event.name: March Meetup - Getting Started with Angular 2

name: Bothell Web Developers Meetup
description: Apply your programming skills to personal projects you want to tackle, share ideas with fellow developers, and deepen your knowledge of web development programming. Whether you are new to the field or have years of experience, we welcome anyone who has a passion to become a better developer and tackle challenging problems. Use this time to focus on your own projects or talk with other developers. Please do not use this group to self promote or recruit people for other projects.

organizer.name: Chris Kincanon
organizer.bio:
CHIEF MOTIVATIONAL BUFF, 
IMMERSION KNOW-IT-ALL, 
WYSIWYG PSYCHIC. 
SOULCYCLE FOR LIFE.

name: Ember.js Munich
description: The Munich Ember.js Meetup. We meet roughly every 2 months.

name: Code Fellows Seattle Meetup
description: Code Fellows offers full-time and part-time programs to train software developers at every experience level. We strongly believe in the power of community and want to contribute in any way we can. Whether you're just starting out or have been a coding for years, come join us!

organizer.name: Code Fellows
organizer.bio: Code Fellows offers world-class software development training in Seattle and Portland. Each course trains students to become professional developers. Diversity Scholarships are open for application at www.codefellows.org/scholarships.

name: Dev en startup (+ jeux vidéos)
description:
Groupe à destination des geeks souhaitant échanger sur le thème du dev en startup tout en jouant aux jeux vidéos.

Format " 1 + 1 " :
- 1 intervention sur le thème du dev en startup (retour d'expérience, cas pratique, débat, ..), suivie de
- 1 tournoi de jeu vidéo sur place (Smash Bros, LOL, Mario Kart, FIFA, ...) dans la bonne humeur

name: NodeUA
description: Ukrainian Node.js community meetup group to discuss technology, exchange experience, find solutions and share case studies

organizer.name: Timur Shemsedinov
organizer.bio: Research fellow in Research Institute of System Technologies, lecturer in NTUU KPI, co-owner & CTO in SinceTV (highload interactive TV second screen platform). Over 20 years in IT, expert in building distributed applications, systems architecture.

name: Webentwicklung Sauerland / Siegerland
description:
Dies ist eine Gruppe für (Web)-Entwickler aus dem Sauerland, Siegerland und Umgebung. Sie soll eine lockere Kooperation verschiedener Webentwickler ermöglichen, die sich regelmäßig zum Austausch über die neusten Webtechnologien treffen und sich gegenseitig bei der Webentwicklung im Fullstack unterstützen.

Egal ob Du gerade auf Schienen, einem Segelboot, einer Insel, einem Elefanten und/oder auf Kaffee bist, ein Knotenproblem in einem Container löst oder Du noch gar keine Ahnung davon hast, was damit gemeint ist: Du bist herzlich eingeladen beizutreten und mit zu machen!

Wir treffen uns jeweils am ersten Arbeitstag im Monat. Somit finden die Treffen an verschiedenen Wochentagen statt, so dass auch diejenigen eine Chance bekommen dabei zu, die bereits feste Wochentermine haben. Außerdem fällt kein Termin auf einen Wochenend- oder Feiertag. Solange sich nichts anderes ergibt, treffen wir uns um 19 Uhr im ess-Bahnhof (http://www.ess-bahnhof.de/) in Lennestadt - Grevenbrück - Eine tolle Location, die sich auch gut mit dem Bus und der Bahn erreichen lässt. Gerne können wir uns aber (auf Einladung) auch an einem anderen Ort zusammenfinden. Schlage einfach mal was vor.

Geplant ist dass wir mit einem Impuls (z.B. in Form eines Kurzvortrags) in ein Thema einsteigen und uns anschließend darüber austauschen. Die Themen sind beliebig: neuste Technologien, irgend ein spannendes Projekt mit dem Du Dich gerade beschäftigst, Probleme mit denen man sich rumschlägt, Tools, Projektmanagement, SEO, DevOp-Dinge, ... Der Kurzvortrag muss keine toll ausgefeilte Präsentation sein - wir haben alle genug zu tun, dann sollte das nicht in Arbeit ausarten - bringe Dich einfach mit dem ein, was Dich gerade beschäftigt, in einer Form, die für Dich wenig Aufwand bedeutet. Themenvorschläge sowie Impulsanmeldungen für die nächsten Treffen sind herzlich willkommen. Wenn wir mal keinen Impuls oder kein Thema für ein Meetup geplant haben sollten, ist das nicht weiter tragisch. Gesprächsstoff haben wir genug!

Wir würden uns freuen, wenn Du das nächste mal mit dabei bist!

name: Meteor Lyon
description: Meteor est une nouvelle plateforme web. Son intérêt se trouve dans ses différents concepts : partage de code frontEnd/backEnd, compensation de latence, temps réel... Venez découvrir cette plateforme, venez partager votre expérience sur Meteor. Ce meetup n'est pas réservé aux seuls techniciens car Meteor se veut facile d'accès. Si vous avez une îdée, venez nous rencontrer pour que l'on puisse concrétiser celle-ci ensemble.
